caption: Application Lifecycle
description: Application Lifecycle events report installation, removal, start, stop of an application or service.
name: application_lifecycle

9.caption: Create
9.description: Create a configuration or setting within an application.

10.caption: Delete

13.caption: User_Activity
13.description: Logs actions taken by users, such as logins and feature use.

14.caption: Data_Access
14.description: Tracks access to data, including read operations.

15.caption: Session
15.description: Records details about user sessions, including duration and type.

16.caption: Transaction
16.description: Logs the start, checkpoints, and end of complex transactions.

17.caption: Notification
17.description: Tracks alerts and notifications sent by the system.

18.caption: Error
18.description: Logs a significant error that occurs within a process or service.

19.caption: Retry
19.description: Attempts to re-execute a failed action due to temporary issues.

20.caption: Debug
20.description: Captures detailed logs for troubleshooting issues within the system.
